Html:
Hi all,

I was trying to see if I could insert a flash object in the text editor. I can't seem to get it to work. Does anyone know how I can upload a .flv file and get it to play when the page opens?
Not sure... check the FCKEditor site. They would have support for that sort of thing.

I've played with this some and it seems to work well.

http://www.flash-control.net/

Give it a try


Bob

Thanks Guys!

What I ended up doing was to download a converter and converted the .flv file to .swf and then dropped the .swf file into /images folder and then referenced the URL in the flash properties of the FCKEditor, like this:

http://localhost/images/file.swf

It worked!

I'll have to check out the flash-control.net sometime...
